author: elephant journal
title: Love Life. {Poem}
text:
But like The Supremes say 
I need to stop in the name of love 
and repeat my new mantra over and over 
while I go about my business have fun and live life 
Realize in the strife that love is always around me 
in my family 
at my job or with friends 
With my angels and God who are with me till the end 
So I thank Him for this reminder that words not only have meaning 
but they’ll help you find 
a peace of mind if you repeat over time 
Don’t let your love life affect how you love life 
for you only have one life to live
